{% endraw %}

Create Ensemble of Learners with n_models. Works pretty much like a single Learner

{% raw %}

Ensemble.export[source]

Ensemble.export(folder='ensemble', pickle_protocol=2)

Export Ensemble and models to self.path/folder, with Ensemble related attributes in ensemble.pkl and each model in model_i.pkl

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

load_ensemble[source]

load_ensemble(folder, cpu=True)

Load Ensemble of learners at once for inference
